title: Asian Grilled Salmon adapted from Barefoot Contessa
directions: Brush a grilling rack with oil (I like to use my George Foreman grill pan in my apartment) to keep the salmon from sticking. Leave it on while you cut the salmon crosswise into four even pieces.
Combine the mustard, soy sauce, olive oil, and garlic in a small bowl, whisking until it’s this interesting shade of yellow-brown.
ingredients: 3 lbs of fresh salmon, skin on
